Note: Williams sustained a lower-abdominal strain and is questionable to play Sunday against the Timberwolves.
Pekovic is sidelined with an achilles injury and there is no timetable for his recovery.
Conley is expected to miss up to four weeks with tendinitis in his Achilles.
Anderson has been sidelined with a lingering ankle injury and is questionable to return Sunday against the Clippers.
Burks is recovering from a left ankle sprain as well as a concussion. He will not play Friday against the Timberwolves.
Pierce will miss an undetermined amount of time after suffering a right ankle sprain.
Iguodala is expected to miss a few games due to a left ankle sprain.
Dinwiddie is sidelined with a bone bruise in his ankle and is questionable to be available for Saturday's game against the Bulls.
Gallinari has two torn lateral ligaments in his right ankle and is expected to be shut down for the remainder of the season.
Cole has been sidelined due to a lower-back injury and is questionable to return Sunday against the Nets.
Bairstow has been sidelined with a back injury and there is no timetable for a return.
Rose exited the last game due to a left elbow contusion and is not expected to suit up Saturday against the Pistons.
Holiday has been diagnosed with a right inferior orbital wall fracture and will miss the remainder of the season.
Gordon had surgery to repair a fractured right ring finger and will miss the remainder of the season.
Belinelli has missed the last four games with a sore right foot and is questionable to return Saturday against the Nuggets.
Warren suffered a broken foot and will miss the remainder of the season.
Embiid is recovering from foot surgery and will not return this season.
Gasol underwent surgery to repair a non-displaced Type II fracture of the navicular bone in his right foot and is expected to miss four-to-six months.
Lawson has a foot injury and is questionable to play Saturday against the 76ers.
Meeks has been sidelined since October with a right foot injury and is in danger of missing the remainder of the season.
Hairston is sidelined with a left groin strain and there is no timetable for his return.
Casspi suffered a strained right hamstring during the last game and is questionable Saturday against the Nuggets.
Anderson has been diagnosed with a sports hernia and could be shut down for the remainder of the season.
Carter-Williams will have surgery to repair a torn labrum in his left hip and will miss the remainder of the season.
Chandler has undergone season-ending hip surgery.
Splitter will miss the remainder of the season after he had surgery to repair a hip injury.
Kaman has missed the last two games due to an illness and is questionable to play Saturday against the Heat.
Young has sat out the last three games due to a case of gastroenteritis and is questionable to be available to play against the Celtics on Sunday.
Jones is sidelined with a respiratory illness and there is no timetable for a return.
Nurkic has missed the last three games due to an illness and is questionable to play Saturday against the Kings.
Favors exited the last game due to right knee soreness and is questionable to play Friday against the Timberwolves.
Exum suffered a torn ACL in his left knee and will miss the entire 2015-16 season.
Scola missed the last game due to a knee injury and is questionable to play Saturday against the Spurs.
Carroll underwent arthroscopic surgery on his right knee in January but could begin practicing in the near future.
Bledsoe had surgery to repair a torn meniscus and will miss the remainder of the season.
Noel has missed the last five games due to a right knee contusion and is questionable to return Saturday against the Pacers.
Wroten will not play this season due to a knee injury.
Thomas is sidelined with a sore left knee and will miss an undetermined amount of time.
Pondexter had surgery to repair his left knee and will miss the remainder of the season.
Evans had surgery to repair a right knee injury and will miss the remainder of the season.
Davis had surgery to repair his left knee and a torn labrum in his left shoulder. He will miss the remainder of the season.
Garnett continues to deal with a right knee injury and is in danger of missing the remainder of the season.
Novak suffered a sprained left MCL and will miss the remainder of the season.
Bayless missed the last game due to a hyper-extended right knee and is questionable to play Sunday against the Bulls.
Wright suffered a Grade 1 sprained MCL in his right knee and there is no timetable for a return.
Adams had surgery to repair his right knee and will miss an undetermined amount of time.
Ezeli is recovering from arthroscopic surgery on his left knee and is expected to return to the lineup next week.
Parsons had surgery to repair a right knee injury and is expected to miss the remainder of the season. He could return during the second round of the postseason.
Jack had surgery to repair a torn ACL and will miss the remainder of the season.
Mayo will miss the remainder of the season with a fractured leg.
Bosh has recovered from blood clots in his leg and has resumed basketball activities. He is hopeful to return to action at some point this season.
Wade missed the last game due to a neck injury and is not expected to play Saturday against the Trail Blazers.
Calderon missed the last game due to a right quad contusion and is questionable to play Saturday against the Pacers.
Gee suffered a complete rupture of the right proximal rectus femoris and will miss the remainder of the season.
Griffin has been cleared for all basketball activities and will begin to serve his four-game suspension. He is eligible to return Sunday against the Wizards.
Gibson missed the last game with a rib contusion but is expected to play against the Pistons on Saturday.
Leonard suffered a dislocated left shoulder and will miss the remainder of the season.
Johnson had surgery to repair the rotator cuff on his left shoulder and will miss the remainder of the season.
Bryant left the last game with left shoulder soreness and is questionable to suit up Sunday against the Celtics.
Evans had surgery on his injured right shoulder injury and will miss the remainder of the season.
Noah had surgery on his separated shoulder for a second time and will miss the remainder of the season.
Kidd-Gilchrist will undergo season-ending surgery to repair a torn labrum in his right shoulder.
Cousins has been suspended by the NBA after picking up his 16th technical foul of the season. He is eligible to return Saturday against the Nuggets.
Stuckey is questionable to play Saturday against the 76ers due to an injured wrist.
